bullets: Deployed a data visualization feature that helps clients digest employee feedback data using React / Typescript.
Implemented front-end code to call asynchronous APIs using Axios library to retrieve employee insight objects.
Constructed logic on client-side using Javascript to process data according to functional design requirements.
Led weekly coordination syncs with project manager and mentor to review product functionality and design improvements leading to 2-3 new features that were integrated into the final product.
Maintained an 85% code coverage over unit tests through edge cases and mock data replication using Jest.

Refactored 4000+ lines of code to assist faculty members track and assess courses based on survey data resulting in improved code legibility and allowing users to share specific landing pages using PHP / jQuery / MySql.
Removed security risk by addressing vulnerable APIs with validation of client-inaccessible PHP session variables.
Enhanced user experience by responding to API calls with HTTP response codes and messages rendered as snackbars.
Increased user information digestion by creating an exportable bar and pie chart data visual using Chart.js.
